__e: I was finding that the best way to avoid taking responsibility was to avoid the person who gave you the responsibility.

You can ice three strangers to frame a man, but when you get that man to murder his own, you better know what you're doing because by forcing him to cut everything from his world, the stage he built for himself, the suit he wore,
Dude, if I avoided every girl I tried to kiss, I couldn't go to the bank, the dentist, the middle school...
Try some today, but watch out for your friends' husbands. They'll be around you like flies.
Please tell them, inspector. Please. If that girl comes back, they must have nothing to do with her!
Humans say they avoid it, but their words don't....
That's why we all need to avoid books and stick to television.
I've written to her advising her to avoid the company of powerful men and women and to stay at home and pray.
All I ever wanted my whole life was a father, and all you ever did was avoid me, and then now when you find out about Lola, you just rush to be by her side.
